name: Roman Defence
description:
Roman Defence is a retro arcade style tower defence game. You play a Roman defending your town from escaped beasts.

This game was designed and made over a weekend for Ludum Dare Game Jam 36 using Scratch to make the game, and the Android apps Pixel Art and PixiTracker to create the sprites and the music.

The Scratch file was converted to Flash using the converter at http://junebeetle.github.io/converter/

This is the first game the team has made together.
